All amendments to the Agreement must be made in writing.
UpCloud may modify this Agreement by notifying the Customer in writing, such as by e-mail or by posting a revised document version on UpCloudâ€™s website.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
